lab_test_prescriptions: Serum glucose level. Serum electrolyte. CT scan

drug_prescriptions: Ampicillin 20mg/kg/dose 6 hourly for 7-10 days. Ceftriaxone 50–80 mg/kg/dose immediately as a single dose.
Metronidazole 800mg (O) 8hourly for 5- 10 days. Secnidazole (O) 2g single dose.
Benzyl Penicillin 50 every 6 hours. : Amoxicillin 15 mg/kg 8 hourly for 7 days.
